tool.name: Whole Image Measurements

param.name: input_path
param.label: Input path
param.help: Enter path to images that need to be measured, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/CroppedImages

param.name: output_path
param.label: Output path
param.help: Enter path to where the results csv file will be saved, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/CroppedImages

param.name: channel
param.label: Optional: Enter channel identifier to analyze, e.g. FITC
param.help: Leave blank to analyze all channels.

param.name: threshold
param.label: Enter intensity value for minimum threshold.
param.help: Must be an integer between 0 and 65536. Enter 0 for no threshold.

tool.help: Measures mean intensity and thresholded mean intensity for entire image (i.e. does not make use of segmentation).
